summary: VA spent $5.7 billion in 2017 on nursing home care for about 39,000 veterans. VA provides or pays for this care in 3 settings—VA-owned centers, veterans homes that states own and operate, and community nursing homes in which VA contracts for care. To help veterans choose where to receive nursing home care, VA developed a website that provides information on the homes' quality. However, VA...
title: VA Nursing Home Care: VA Has Opportunities to Enhance Its Oversight and Provide More Comprehensive Information on Its Website
